content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map during these steps. Multiple attempts were made to place a Lab at position (0.5, y=2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, but all such attempts failed because the Lab was not available in the inventory. Although existing furnaces were used for smelting (one at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)), no new structure was created by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage for get_entities:
 – Do not pass unsupported keyword arguments (such as 'radius'); adjust the call to match the function’s expected parameters.
 – Ensure the number and type of arguments (positional or otherwise) adhere to the function signature.
 – Handle cases where get_entities might return None by falling back to an empty list to avoid iteration errors.

• Lab Placement and Crafting:
 – Before attempting to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), verify that a Lab is available in the inventory.
 – Check that all required sub-ingredients for Lab crafting (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available and that their production chains are functional.
 – Implement precondition checks to prevent errors such as iterating over a NoneType when filtering for existing Labs.

• Resource and Production Management:
 – Validate the complete resource availability and intermediate production (e.g., obtaining sufficient iron plates and copper plates) before reattempting complex crafts.
 – Ensure that any shortfall in necessary ingredients is addressed in the production chain to prevent repeated crafting failures.
